charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1101_010:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was adventuring,
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] noticed something flash deep in the forest.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1101_020: Was someone having a Pokémon battle?
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1101_030:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] continued on,
as though drawn by an unseen power.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_040:
Hmm, it seems like it’ll take some practice to fully
master this move...
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_050:
Hm? Oh, if it isn’t [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
What are you doing out here so late?
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_060:
Ahh, you noticed the light just now? I was just
having Ho-Oh show me its moves.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_0401_080:
*chuckle* Yes, it does. This Ho-Oh is a very
special Pokémon, after all.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_0402_100:
Yes, that’s right. And it shines beautifully,
doesn’t it?
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_110:
Ho-Oh is a Legendary Pokémon with
rainbow-colored feathers originally
discovered in the Johto region.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_120:
It’s so beautiful, just sparkling like that. Whenever
I’m with it, I can’t help but feel that meeting it
was a miracle.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_130:
And I just got so happy and excited while I
was training, I didn’t even realize how late
it had gotten.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_0401_150:
Yes! I’ve always wanted to battle alongside
Ho-Oh, and now I can!
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_0402_170:
Yes! I’ve been testing out all sorts of different
battle techniques that I’ve always wanted to try
with Ho-Oh!
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_180:
Up until now, I’ve always battled with
Ghost-type Pokémon on my team.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_190:
They usually require very different strategies,
so I want to hurry up and figure out the
perfect combination.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_200:
But, to tell the truth...I think I made Ho-Oh worry
about me a little.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_0401_220: Yes, I just got too hasty and overworked myself.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_0402_240:
I got too hasty and overworked myself... As you
can see, I trained until dark.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_250:
But Ho-Oh saw right through me and all
my impatience...
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_260: It led me here—to this quiet, calming place.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_270: And then it looked just as it does in legend.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_280:
Its shining wings looked just like a rainbow. It was
a beauty I can’t possibly describe.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_0401_300:
Yes. I’m sure I’ll remember that sight for the rest
of my life.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_0302_310: I wish I could have seen!
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_0402_320:
I wish I could have shown you, too! I know I’ll
never forget that sight as long as I live.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_330: It must have been my destiny to meet this Ho-Oh.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_340:
I’m sure it will happen to you, too... Someday,
your life will lead you to your destined partner.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_350:
Be sure to keep up your training so you’re ready
for that day!
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_360:
And of course, I’ll be continuing my own training
as well.
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_370:
Now that I’ve finally met my destined partner,
I don’t intend to lose to anyone!
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_380:
Even if, for example...my opponent has his
own Ho-Oh!
charaepi_ch0148_10_matsuba/2301_1201_390:
So I swear, I’ll guide this Ho-Oh and train it until
it becomes the strongest there is.
